findings.title: Potential security related issues in LiquidityProtection_beforeTokenTransfer

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: Using SafeMath library is unnecessary in Solidity 0.8.0+ and can be replaced with normal arithmetic operators for readability and gas saving.
